Verses: 1 novaavin Kumaararaagiya Sem Kaam Yaappedh Enbavargalin Vamsavaralaaru: Jalappralayaththukkuppinbu Avargalukkuk Kumaarar Pirandhaargal.
2 yaappeththin Kumaarar, Komar, Maakoku, Maadhaai, Yaavaan, Thoopaal, Mesekku, Theeraas Enbavargal.
3 komarin Kumaarar, Askinaas, Reeppaaththu, Thokarmaa Enbavargal.
4 yaavaanin Kumaarar, Eleesaa, Tharshees, Kiththeem, Thodhaaneem Enbavargal.
5 ivargalaal Jaadhigaludaiya Theevugal, Avanavan Baashaiyinpadiyeyum, Avaravargal Koththiraththinpadiyeyum, Jaadhiyinpadiyeyum, Veruveru Dhesangalaaip Pagukkappattana.
6 kaamudaiya Kumaarar, Koosh, Misraayeem, Poodh, Kaanaan Enbavargal.
7 kooshudaiya Kumaarar, Sepaa, Aavilaa, Sapdhaa, Raamaa, Sapdhigaa Enbavargal. Raamaavin Kumaarar, Sepaa, Thidhaan Enbavargal.
8 koosh Nimrodhaip Petraan; Ivan Boomiyile Paraakkiramasaaliyaanaan.
9 ivan Karththarukku Munbaagap Balaththa Vettaikkaaranaayirundhaan; Aagaiyaal Karththarukku Munbaaga Balaththa Vettaikkaaranaana Nimrodhaip Pola Ennum Vazhakkachchol Undaayitru.
10 sineyaar Dhesaththilulla Paabel, Erek, Akkaadh, Kalne Ennum Idangal Avan Aanda Raajyaththirku Aadhi Sthaanangal.
11 andha Dhesaththilirundhu Asoor Purappattuppoi, Niniveyaiyum, Regopodh Pattanaththaiyum, Kaalaagaiyum,
12 ninivekkum Kaalaagukkum Naduvaaga Resenaiyum Kattinaan; Idhu Periya Pattanam.
13 misraayeem, Loodheemaiyum, Anaameemaiyum, Lekaabeemaiyum, Napdhookeemaiyum,
14 padhruseemaiyum, Pelistharin Sandhadhikkuth Thalaivanaagiya Kaslookeemaiyum, Kapdhoreemaiyum Petraan.
15 kaanaan Than Mooththa Maganaagiya Seedhonaiyum, Keththaiyum,
16 epoosiyaraiyum, Emoriyaraiyum, Kirkaasiyaraiyum,
17 eviyaraiyum, Arkeeyaraiyum, Seeniyaraiyum,
18 arvaadhiyaraiyum, Semaariyaraiyum, Kaamaaththiyaraiyum Petraan; Pinbu Kaanaaniyarin Vamsaththaar Engum Paravinaargal.
19 kaanaaniyarin Ellai, Seedhonmudhal Keraar Vazhiyaaik Kaasaamattukkum, Adhu Mudhal Sodhom, Komoraa, Adhmaa, Sepoyim Vazhiyaai Laasaamattukkum Irundhadhu.
20 ivargal Thangal Dhesangalilum, Thangal Jaadhigalilumulla Thangal Vamsangalinpadiyeyum, Thangal Baashaigalinpadiyeyum Kaamudaiya Sandhadhiyaar.
21 semukkum Pillaigal Pirandhaargal; Avan Eperudaiya Sandhadhiyaar Ellaarukkum Thagappanum, Mooththavanaagiya Yaappeththukkuth Thambiyumaai Irundhaan.
22 semudaiya Kumaarar, Elaam, Asoor, Arpaksaadh, Loodh, Aaraam Enbavargal.
23 aaraamudaiya Kumaarar, Oodhs, Kool, Kethther, Maas Enbavargal.
24 arpaksaadh Saalaavaip Petraan; Saalaa Eperaip Petraan.
25 eperukku Irandu Kumaarar Pirandhaargal; Oruvanukkup Peleku Endru Per; Enenil Avanudaiya Naatkalil Boomi Pagukkappattadhu; Avanudaiya Sagodharan Per Yokdhaan.
26 yokdhaan Almodhaadhaiyum, Saaleppaiyum, Asarmaaveththaiyum, Yeraagaiyum,
27 adhoraamaiyum, Oosaalaiyum, Thiklaavaiyum,
28 opaalaiyum, Apimaavelaiyum, Sepaavaiyum,
29 oppeeraiyum, Aavilaavaiyum, Yopaapaiyum Petraan; Ivargal Anaivarum Yokdhaanudaiya Kumaarar.
30 ivargaludaiya Kudiyiruppu Mesaa Thuvakki, Kizhakkeyulla Malaiyaagiya Seppaarukkup Pogira Vazhimattum Irundhadhu.
31 ivargale Thangal Dhesangalilum, Thangal Jaadhigalilumulla Thangal Vamsangalinpadiyeyum, Thangal Baashaigalinpadiyeyum Semudaiya Sandhadhiyaar.
32 thangal Jaadhigalilulla Thangaludaiya Sandhadhigalinpadiye Novaavudaiya Kumaararin Vamsangal Ivaigale; Jalappralayaththukkup Pinbu Ivargalaal Boomiyile Jaadhigal Pirindhana.
